title: Luther's Hymn
verses: Great God,what do I see and hear! The The Judge of man I see appear, On
end of things cre-a-ted! The trumpet clouds of glo-ry spread:
sounds; the graves re-store The dead which they con-
tain'd before: Prepare, my soul, to meet him.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Expresses anticipation of the final judgment and resurrection
